entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 24. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
